column2:
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! receives the 'Alexandrine' trait:
§Y*§! §G+2§! Learning
§Y*§! §G+1§! Stewardship
§Y*§! §R-1§! Diplomacy
§Y*§! §G+0.5§! Monthly Prestige
§Y*§! §G+20§! Opinion from others with 'Alexandrine' trait
§Y*§! §R-20§! Opinion from others with 'Antiochene' or 'Zealous' traits

§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! receives the 'Antiochian' trait:
§Y*§! §G+2§! Learning
§Y*§! §G+1§! Diplomacy
§Y*§! §R-1§! Stewardship
§Y*§! §G+0.5§! Monthly Piety
§Y*§! §G+20§! Opinion from others with 'Antiochian' trait
§Y*§! §R-20§! Opinion from others with 'Alexandrine' or 'Cynical' traits
Begin driving out the daemons from within.
Begin the task of translating the Bible\n
The translation will be good and well-received\n
The translation will be poor and not well-received\n
Choose which patron saint will watch over you.
Elect a Cathar bishop to become leader of the faith, creating the Cathar Papacy
Create an Archegos to lead the Manichaean faithful
Have not failed to drive out daemons within last 3 years
Begin the search for a suitable child to adopt
